A hat with built-in GPS tracker: This innovative hat can help you navigate your way around town or even track your outdoor activities. It's equipped with a GPS tracker that can be connected to your smartphone, allowing you to monitor your location, speed, and route. This can be particularly useful for hikers, runners, and cyclists who need to stay on track and avoid getting lost.

A hat with a solar-powered fan: During hot summer days, this hat can keep you cool and comfortable. It's equipped with a small solar panel that can charge a built-in fan, providing a refreshing breeze when you need it most. The fan is also adjustable, so you can control the airflow and find the perfect level of comfort.

A hat with a built-in waterproof phone case: This hat is designed to protect your phone from the elements while also keeping you warm and dry. It's equipped with a waterproof phone case that can fit most phone models, allowing you to keep your phone safe and dry even in the rain or snow. The case also has a built-in speaker, so you can listen to music or take calls without having to remove your phone from the case.

A hat with a built-in camera: This hat is perfect for photographers who want to capture stunning shots of their surroundings. It's equipped with a built-in camera that can take high-quality photos and videos, and it's designed to be easy to use. The camera is also adjustable, so you can find the perfect angle and focus for your shots.

A hat with a built-in LED light: This hat is perfect for nighttime activities, such as camping or hiking. It's equipped with a built-in LED light that can illuminate your path and keep you safe. The light is also adjustable, so you can control the brightness and direction of the light. Additionally, the hat has a rechargeable battery, so you can keep the light on for as long as you need it.
